creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: inside two wooden boxes, outer box has a dark patina, inner box has inscription on the outside of lid with cut decorative detail; wrapped in tissue; fabric is green with geometric and floral pattern; image of mountains in the background with a small building on LL side and a figure on a bridge over a waterfall to the R; four line inscription TR corner
title: Mountain View with Waterfall
